testcase.classname: As a visitor, when I enter the product I want into the search bar and perform a search, I should be able to confirm that the results include the product I entered.
testcase.name: TC_01 >>> After entering a product into the search bar, I should be able to verify that the search results contain the entered product
testcase.system-out: * Open the browser and go to "amazonUrl"....................................passed * Verify that the search bar is visible and accessible......................passed * Enter "iPhone" into the search bar and perform the search.................passed * It is confirmed that the search results contain "iPhone"..................passed * Close the browser.........................................................passed
